  4. Dropped

    27.09.2015

    As a way to encourage myself to keep taking pictures I was going to to do another daily photo project, but that would have lasted 1 month at best. Instead I'm going to do a weekly project, during which I'll post at least 1 photo per week to the blog. It's like a daily project, just 6/7ths easier!
